attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since rules were relaxed we have seen a deterioration in British TV to such a level that it is worse than America. Television Channels must return to Franchises being awarded based on Quality and not Profits. Gambling Must not be advertised before the watershed and Ambulance Chasing Ad's and ad's for loans must be banished altogether. Advertising must return to no more than two ad breaks per hour, and no more than 7 mins per hour.
